title: Zoomin Toobin, How to Pitch Biden to Voters, and Analyzing Polls with Ben Tulchin
description:
Katie and Matt analyze the Jeffrey Toobin story and come up with a few ways to pitch Biden to undecided voters. Pollster Ben Tulchin, who worked on Bernie Sanders' campaigns in 2016 and 2020, joins the show to break down the polls and what to look for on election night.
Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
